block.p: Annika Kristina Roesner, a daughter of Kristina and Karl Roesner of Goteborg, Sweden, was married yesterday to Aaron John Kennon, the son of Glynnis Kennon and Dr. Irwin Kennon of Rehoboth, Mass. The Rev. Mikael Ringlander performed the ceremony at Orgryte Gamla Kyrka, a Lutheran church in Goteborg.

Mrs. Kennon, 28, is a management consultant at PricewaterhouseCoopers, the New York accounting and consulting firm. She graduated with a master's degree in mechanical engineering from Chalmers University of Technology in Goteborg. Her father is the chief executive of SolNiver Lines, an international shipping line based in Goteborg.

Annika Kristina Roesner, a daughter of Kristina and Karl Roesner of Goteborg, Sweden, was married yesterday to Aaron John Kennon, the son of Glynnis Kennon and Dr. Irwin Kennon of Rehoboth, Mass. The Rev. Mikael Ringlander performed the ceremony at Orgryte Gamla Kyrka, a Lutheran church in Goteborg.

Mrs. Kennon, 28, is a management consultant at PricewaterhouseCoopers, the New York accounting and consulting firm. She graduated with a master's degree in mechanical engineering from Chalmers University of Technology in Goteborg. Her father is the chief executive of SolNiver Lines, an international shipping line based in Goteborg.
Mr. Kennon, 25, is an institutional bond trader at Salomon Smith Barney in New York. His father, a dentist, has a practice in Taunton, Mass.
